title: 3 and Out - Julio Trade Ripple Effect; Rodgers Leverage Hit; Saban Sticking Around; Rapid Fire NFL Headlines; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Julio Trade Ripple Effect; Rodgers Leverage Hit; Saban Sticking Around; Rapid Fire NFL Headlines; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John reacts to the Titans pulling off a blockbuster deal with the Falcons for Julio Jones, and why the Packers wide receivers showing up to OTA's hurts Aaron Rodgers leverage to get out of Green Bay. He also goes fires through the top college and pro headlines and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
